channel.title: Possible Auxy YouTube tutorials?
channel.description: I came across a problem earlier this morning: I didn't know how to create a simple lead for future bass, so naturally I looked up how to do it on YouTube. There was nothing there. I'm proposing that people who get featured on the Auxy feed or people who get the top spot in the Beat The Clock should be offered a chance to explain how they made that track and go over sound design tips and any other knowledge they may want to pass on to us. It wouldn't be mandatory, but it would be a way to give back to the community they love, and I think a lot of us would benefit from it. Is this a good idea? Let me know in the comments below.

item.title: Possible Auxy YouTube tutorials?
item.dc:creator: Akyut
item.description:
Yup! Think of it as a revival of an old project. My hope is that I can have artists come in and give very specific tutorials; for those wishing to make their sound more complex. Think of techniques with instruments like stress, or story. Very specialized.

It’ll start as soon as the iOS beta becomes available to everybody. I’ll keep you guys posted!

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Auxy YouTube tutorials?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
I did mention that the thread was for more general stuff, and writing future bass isn’t exactly limited to auxy. Writing it in auxy just requires knowing how to write it in general with an understanding of the auxy interface. Not only that but the thread with Akyut’s stuff was mentioned after I had posted the link as well @akabillposters

edit: Also, just realized that the OP of this thread also mentioned specifically wanting BTC winners to discuss production tips and sound design and other such things, which is what your thread is for. Just thought I’d mention that.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Auxy YouTube tutorials?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
TheRealJFalc:

There’s actually a thread for video tutorials by the users,

Just to clarify, that thread isn’t dedicated to Auxy tutes. It’s aimed at sharing content on all aspects of music writing, production and marketing – and to see how established and emerging artists create their music and their sound, also what motivates and inspires them.

It’s certainly OK to post Auxy tutorials there, but (as the OP of that thread) I’d like the thread to reach beyond the ‘tools’ we use and be about improving our thinking, writing and production techniques.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Auxy YouTube tutorials?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
There’s actually a thread for video tutorials by the users, however I’m not sure if anyone’s done future bass yet.

Post writing and production tips (links & embeds only) Production Talk
I’m starting this thread for us to share found videos, articles, insights, analysis, etc… about the creative process of creating songs, tracks, etc… as well as touching upon stuff like profile/career promotion and development. Anything good that might inspire us to be better in some aspect of our music writing and production. Anyone here can add a post, for any genre. I’d like this thread to have minimal – ideally no – comments/discussion, just embeds and links to good content. (Of course, f…

Maybe you’ll be able to find some ideas there for more general stuff however.

Read full topic
